attributes.action: leagalized the EU Disabiled Rights new leigasation for all disabilities not just for people who are born with a disability
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I would like Gordon Brown to estended the new eu disability right act to all disabiled people and for theose who were
struck down with uncurable disease ie motor neuron disease as my sister-in-law is paying for her own care and equipment her self.she use to be a dam good inspector for west mercia police force but she can't get social help help through normal channels as she has worked. i hope gorden brown will make changes to eu new legasation for all disabiled . Joanna Reinlo
